original_title: Let Them Play - A Triathlon Across America
overview: Former MLB player Eric Byrnes tackles a one-of-a-kind endurance feat in the documentary film, Let Them Play: A Triathlon Across America. Follow Byrnes's quest to swim, bike and run across the United States to blaze a trail for youth physical education reform, as he showcases inspiring leaders along the journey.
title: Let Them Play - A Triathlon Across America
